code:
import axios from'axios';var URL='http://localhost:3000';//POST login by address http://localhost:3000/api/user/login
export var login=function login(user,password){return axios.post("".concat(URL,"/api/user/login"),{user:user,password:password});};//POST register by address http://localhost:3000/api/user/register
export var register=function register(user,password){return axios.post("".concat(URL,"/api/user/register"),{user:user,password:password});};//GET all todos by address http://localhost:3000/api/list/getList
export var getTodos=function getTodos(token){return axios.get("".concat(URL,"/api/list/getList"),{headers:{'x-auth-token':token}});};//POST one todo by address http://localhost:3000/api/list/addTodo
export var addTodo=function addTodo(data,token){return axios.post("".concat(URL,"/api/list/addTodo"),data,{headers:{'x-auth-token':token}});};//GET check or unCheck a todo by address http://localhost:3000/api/list/editTodo/:id
export var editTodo=function editTodo(id,token){return axios.get("".concat(URL,"/api/list/editTodo/").concat(id),{headers:{'x-auth-token':token}});};//DELETE one todo by address http://localhost:3000/api/list/deleteTodo/:id
export var deleteTodo=function deleteTodo(id,token){return axios.delete("".concat(URL,"/api/list/deleteTodo/").concat(id),{headers:{'x-auth-token':token}});};
